Name: Caneflower cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rust coloured and bittersweet with cachaça and elderflower.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2009 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler in Portland, Oregon, USA. Jeff's original recipe calls for a "generous twist of lemon" rather than orange. On JeffreyMorgenthaler.com , he says this cocktail was " Inspired in part by a gorgeous cocktail created by my good friend Gonçalo de Souza Monteiro, the Comte de Sureau . "
Nutrition: One serving of Caneflower cocktail contains 191 calories
